Name: Paris Sour
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A wonderfully accommodating whiskey sour - it's easy to make and a pleasure to drink.
History: Created in 2005 by Mark at Match Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Paris Sour contains 213 calories
